pages.text: The forest is one of the most sacred places to be, and this ritual allows forests to spread. Existing trees will shed saplings, and those saplings will be planted and grown.$(br2)$(warning) A sapling or fully grown tree nearby is required to start the process.$(br2)$(warning) Some trees, such as Wildwood trees, are unaffected by this ritual.$(br2)$(standing_stones) $(l:rituals/ritual_spreading_forest#multiblock)This ritual requires standing stones.$()
